thread.title: Chinese Tea Ad Shows Obama And Kim Jong Un In Loving Embrace
thread.title_full: Chinese Tea Ad Shows Obama And Kim Jong Un In Loving Embrace

author: Andy McDonald
title: Chinese Tea Ad Shows Obama And Kim Jong Un In Loving Embrace
text:
Chinese Tea Ad Shows Obama And Kim Jong Un In Loving Embrace This must be some strong tea. Andy McDonald Associate Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 08/10/2015 03:34 PM EDT | Edited: 4 minutes ago 
The hug heard 'round the world. 
Reddit user TurboCancer provided this little gem on Sunday , a tea advertisement in China depicting President Obama and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un bringing it in for the real thing. 
Translated to English, the ad, which is reportedly promoting some sort of sweet tea, says, "After drinking <product name>, the people of the world will become united." Reddit 
Photoshop is a helluva drug.
